name: Anderson Maciel
content: Anderson Maciel Prof. Anderson Maciel Graphics, Visualization and Interaction Lab Federal University of Rio Grande do Sul (UFRGS) amaciel at inf dot ufrgs dot br Research area I'm interested in a broad range of topics in Graphics, Visualization and Human-computer Interaction. This includes virtual reality, augmented reality, physically plausible animation, haptics, interactive visualization, medical applications in graphics and VR, wearable and handheld interaction among others. Lab home-page.
